languages.text: {n}Вдруг периферийным зрением вы улавливаете движение — вихрь юбок, хрупкий силуэт. Это Мейв, тонко вскрикнув, бросается между вами и ощерившейся бестией.{/n} "Прочь! Прочь от мое{mf|го|й} госпо{mf|дина|жи}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Вдруг периферийным зрением вы улавливаете движение — вихрь юбок, хрупкий силуэт. Это Мейв, тонко вскрикнув, бросается между вами и ощерившейся бестией.{/n} "Прочь! Прочь от мое{mf|го|й} госпо{mf|дина|жи}!"

languages.text: {n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вдруг периферийным зрением вы улавливаете движение — вихрь юбок, хрупкий силуэт. Это Мейв, тонко вскрикнув, бросается между вами и ощерившейся бестией.{/n} "Прочь! Прочь от мое{mf|го|й} госпо{mf|дина|жи}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly your peripheral vision catches movement: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a little shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

{n}Suddenly your peripheral vision catches movement: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a little shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

{n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

{n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

{n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

{n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich bemerkst du im Augenwinkel eine Bewegung: wirbelnde Röcke, eine zierliche Gestalt. Mit einem gellenden Schrei wirft sich Maive zwischen dich und die knurrende Bestie.{/n} "Fort mit dir! Lass {mf|meinen Herrn|meine Herrin} in Ruhe!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich bemerkst du im Augenwinkel eine Bewegung: wirbelnde Röcke, eine zierliche Gestalt. Mit einem gellenden Schrei wirft sich Maive zwischen dich und die knurrende Bestie.{/n} "Fort mit dir! Lass {mf|meinen Herrn|meine Herrin} in Ruhe!"

languages.text: {n}Soudain, vous voyez quelque chose bouger du coin de l'œil : les volants d'une robe, une frêle silhouette. En poussant un petit cri, Maive s'interpose entre vous et la bête féroce.{/n} « Va-t'en ! Ne t'approche pas de {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, vous voyez quelque chose bouger du coin de l'œil : les volants d'une robe, une frêle silhouette. En poussant un petit cri, Maive s'interpose entre vous et la bête féroce.{/n} « Va-t'en ! Ne t'approche pas de {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! »

languages.text: {n}突然间，你通过眼角的余光，瞥见有什么东西在动——那是一条飘扬的裙子，一个孱弱的身影。你听到了细微的尖叫，随后，梅芙便冲了过来，挡在你和咆哮的异虎之间。{/n}“退后！离我的大人远点！”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然间，你通过眼角的余光，瞥见有什么东西在动——那是一条飘扬的裙子，一个孱弱的身影。你听到了细微的尖叫，随后，梅芙便冲了过来，挡在你和咆哮的异虎之间。{/n}“退后！离我的大人远点！”

languages.text: {n}De repente, ves algo moverse por el rabillo del ojo: un torbellino de faldas y una frágil figura. Con un breve chillido, Maive se interpone entre la bestia rugiente y tú.{/n} «¡Fuera de aquí! ¡Aléjate de mi{mf|lord|lady}!».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, ves algo moverse por el rabillo del ojo: un torbellino de faldas y una frágil figura. Con un breve chillido, Maive se interpone entre la bestia rugiente y tú.{/n} «¡Fuera de aquí! ¡Aléjate de mi{mf|lord|lady}!».

languages.text: {n}突然、視界の片隅で何かが動くのが見えた。スカートの渦巻き、か細い姿。小さな悲鳴とともに、メイヴが吠え立つ獣とあなたの間に飛び込んだ。{/n}「どきなさい！天の{mf|君|姫}から離れて！」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、視界の片隅で何かが動くのが見えた。スカートの渦巻き、か細い姿。小さな悲鳴とともに、メイヴが吠え立つ獣とあなたの間に飛び込んだ。{/n}「どきなさい！天の{mf|君|姫}から離れて！」

languages.text: {n}Bir anda hareketlenen bir şey, gözüne takılıyor: Eteği hızla kıpırdanan, narin bir figür. Maive, kısık bir çığlıkla kendini seninle hırlayan canavar arasına atıyor.{/n} "Defol! {mf|Lordumdan|Leydimden} uzak dur!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you see something moving out of the corner of your eye: a whirl of skirts, a frail figure. With a small shriek, Maive throws herself between you and the snarling beast.{/n} "Off with you! Get away from my {mf|lord|lady}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir anda hareketlenen bir şey, gözüne takılıyor: Eteği hızla kıpırdanan, narin bir figür. Maive, kısık bir çığlıkla kendini seninle hırlayan canavar arasına atıyor.{/n} "Defol! {mf|Lordumdan|Leydimden} uzak dur!"
